description: Try our easy to follow Honey Apple Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey Apple Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, quarter apples and core. Thinly slice and place in a large bowl with onion, mint, mayonnaise, salt and pepper. Toss until combined. Serve drumsticks with apple salad.
